question: A low-friction cart moves left at a constant 4 m/s relative to the Earth frame as shown.  Trogdor and his majestic yellow ruler move right at a constant 2 m/s relative to the Earth Frame.  Sam, at this instant is also moving at 2 m/s to the right relative to the Earth frame but he is speeding up at a rate of 3 m/s2. Which of the following is true?
